Topic 1.question: in this type of question you can have images, such as the one included etc.... Complete the KQL query
Topic 1.explanation:
- **`| where Operation in ({{Operations}})`**: This safely uses a dynamic parameter in a way that avoids Python or templating conflicts. It allows KQL to match a list of values provided at runtime.

- **`| project Site_Url`**: Filters the output to only include site URLs, inherently excluding null or empty values.

Escaping the curly braces ensures compatibility with template engines and editors without altering the query logic.

Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/visualize-data#use-parameters-in-kql-queries
